mapper.sql: warehousing_no, target, `method`, carrier, track_no, deliver_method, clearance_type,tax_type, insurance, insurance_num, estimated_date, create_on, update_on, creator,updator
mapper.select: select warehousing_no, target, `method`, carrier, track_no, deliver_method, clearance_type, tax_type, insurance, insurance_num, estimated_date, warehousing.create_on, warehousing.update_on, creator, updator, warehousing.channel_code, channel_name from l_warehousing warehousing left join l_channel channel on (warehousing.channel_code = channel.channel_code) where warehousing_no = #{warehousingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into l_warehousing (warehousing_no, target, `method`, carrier, track_no, channel_code, deliver_method, clearance_type, tax_type, insurance, insurance_num, estimated_date, create_on, update_on, creator, updator, status) values (#{warehousingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel}, #{deliverMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clearanceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insurance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{estimatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status})

mapper.update:
update l_warehousing
target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carrier = #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
track_no = #{trackNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carrier_in_japan = #{carrierInJapan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
track_no_in_japan = #{trackNoInJapan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliver_method = #{deliverMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clearance_type = #{clearanceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tax_type = #{taxType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insurance = #{insurance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insurance_num = #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
estimated_date = #{estimatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_on = #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_on = #{updateOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channel_code = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
user_warehousing_file_uuid = #{userWarehousingFileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where warehousing_no = #{warehousingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update l_warehousing set target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carrier = #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, track_no = #{trackNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_method = #{deliverMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clearance_type = #{clearanceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_type = #{taxType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insurance = #{insurance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insurance_num = #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, estimated_date = #{estimatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_on = #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_on = #{updateOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where warehousing_no = #{warehousingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from l_warehousing warehousing left join l_warehousing_content content on (warehousing.warehousing_no = content.warehousing_no) where deliver_method = #{method} order by warehousing.create_on desc

select * from l_warehousing warehousing left join l_warehousing_content content on (warehousing.warehousing_no = content.warehousing_no) left join l_channel channel on (warehousing.channel_code = channel.channel_code) where warehousing.status = #{status} and warehousing.method = #{method} order by warehousing.create_on desc
select * from l_warehousing order by create_on desc limit 1
